section.p: You swim out to the shrine of the sea gods. .

outcomes.outcome: A crocodile snaps at you, lose 1-6 Stamina
You lose your purse, cross off all your cash
You reach the shrine without incident

p.if: Assuming you survive, you touch the obelisk and receive a blessing of Safety from Storms, as long as you didn’t have one already. Note this in the Blessings box on your Adventure Sheet.

To swim back you must
make another SCOUTING roll at Difficulty 11 .
